definition: main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The ontological character of literary understanding signifies self-understanding of interpretive subject.
sentences.chinese: 理解的本体论性质意味着阐释主体的自我理解。

sentences.english: This is the noumenon affirmation of the historical law.
sentences.chinese: 这是在本体论层面对历史规律存在的肯定。

sentences.english: The first chapter is the literature ontology.
The front defrosting duct assembly and the dashboard body are assembled together.
sentences.chinese: 前除霜风道总成和仪表板本体装配在一起。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an ontology-driven intelligent knowledge navigation map.
sentences.chinese: 该文提出建立基于本体驱动的智能知识导航图。

sentences.english: I have never seen anyone die for the ontologi-cal argument.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有见过有人为本体论的争辩而死。

sentences.english: The button can be filled with different aromatic substances to be made into a children's health care badge.
sentences.chinese: 钮扣本体可充注各种芳香物质和制成儿童保健胸章。

sentences.english: Substance is an ultimate category in traditional western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 本体是传统西方哲学中的一个根本性的范畴。

sentences.english: A frame-based ontology model expressing hybrid knowledge is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种描述混合知识类型的本体知识表达模型。

sentences.english: What is proper to the totality of signifiers.
sentences.chinese: 什么是意符的整体性的本体位置？

sentences.english: Could you please explaining briefly on your thinking of the conflicts between ontology and constructionism?
sentences.chinese: 您是否可以对本体论和建构论之间的悖论稍作解释？

sentences.english: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
sentences.chinese: 因为他知道我们的本体，思念我们不过是尘土。

sentences.english: The essence of Wang Bi's philosophy is non-being.
The more independent and systemic the noumenon is, the maturer the art gets.
sentences.chinese: 本体独立性越强，体系越完善，艺术就越成熟。

sentences.english: We need to open the thought and enter noumenon of traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 需要把思路打开，还须进入我们传统文化的本体。

sentences.english: I support movement therapies that strengthen balance, proprioception, and touch.
sentences.chinese: 运动治疗可以强化平衡感，本体感受能力和触觉。

definition: to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
